TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ScriptManagerDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner

summary.span: 在可视化设计器中为 控件提供设计时支持。

span.span: Provides design-time support for the control in a visual designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关详细信息，请参阅 类文档。For more information, see the class documentation.

span.span: ASP.NET Control Designers Overview

related.span: 演练：为 Web 服务器控件创建基本控件设计器

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 当在 设计图面上创建关联控件或该控件的副本时，内部构造该类的一个新实例。The [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] internally constructs a new instance of the class when it creates the associated control or a copy of that control on the design surface.

param.span: 与此网页关联的 控件。

span.span: The control that is associated with the Web page.

param.name: proxies
param.span: 与网页相关联的 控件的集合。

summary.span: 返回在网页的 控件和 控件中定义的所有 控件的集合。

span.span: Returns a collection of all controls that are defined in a Web page's control and controls.

returns.span: 一个由 控件组成的只读集合。

span.span: A read-only collection of controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的集合包括框架脚本，这些脚本会自动发送到客户端以支持 AJAX 功能 ，如和 控件。The collection that is returned includes framework scripts that are sent automatically to the client to support AJAX functionality such as the and control. 使用 方法时，请注意以下准则：When you use the method, be aware of the following guidelines: - 将删除具有相同 和 属性的对象。 objects with the same and properties are removed as duplicates. - 在设计时，不会删除具有相同的对象。 objects with the same are not removed as duplicates at design time. 但是，它们会在运行时作为重复项删除。However, they are removed as duplicates at run time. - 方法用于返回对象的属性的完全限定 URL 。The method is used to return a fully qualified URL for the property of a object. - 返回的集合中的对象是原始脚本引用的克隆版本，因此不能使用此集合在设计器代码中修改。The objects in the returned collection are cloned versions of the original script references and therefore cannot be modified in designer code by using this collection.

span.span: is .
